<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently all users of a global variable have to be non-volatile loads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or stores of the global type, and the global cannot be stored itself.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">    if (auto &#42;Store = dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;(U))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">             Store-&gt;getValueOperand()-&gt;getType() == GV-&gt;getValueType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">    if (auto &#42;Load = dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;(U))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">      return !Load-&gt;isVolatile() &amp;&amp; Load-&gt;getType() == GV-&gt;getValueType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
